DemandCard.styles: bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

CreateThemeButton.style: bg-sky-500 hover:bg-sky-600 text-white rounded-full px-6 py-4 shadow-lg shadow-sky-500/30 flex items-center gap-2 font-semibold transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

PresentationMode.overlay: fixed inset-0 z-[100] bg-slate-900/95 backdrop-blur-xl flex items-center justify-center p-8
PresentationMode.card: bg-white w-full max-w-4xl aspect-video rounded-3xl shadow-2xl p-16 flex flex-col justify-between relative overflow-hidden

setup: Ensure Tailwind config includes the custom colors and fonts.
implementation_steps: 1. Layout Construction: Build the vertical container with 3 distinct 'Droppable' zones using Framer Motion Reorder or dnd-kit.
2. Card Design: Create the 'DemandCard' component. It must be elegant, not cluttered. Use badges for 'Sub-group'.
3. Interaction: Implement the 'Create Theme' floating button. It opens a Shadcn Dialog.
4. Presentation Mode: Create a full-screen overlay. Use the 'textures.presentation_bg' as a subtle background image with low opacity. The content should appear as a large 'Slide'.
5. Filtering: Add a sticky header or sidebar for 'Priority' and 'Sub-group' filters.
critical_constraints: Do NOT use generic blue (#0000FF). Use the specified Slate/Sky palette.
Ensure drag-and-drop works smoothly between the vertical sections.
The 'Presentation Mode' must look like a Keynote slide, not just a bigger modal.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.design_philosophy: Clean, Airy, Professional but not Boring.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.interactions: All buttons must have active/hover states. Lists should have staggered entrance animations.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT.accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the light blue backgrounds.
